Posts.Content: Aug 20, 2012 01:43PM Kd6blk wrote: Hi girls, my name is also Lisa. I had my bMX on August 1st down at PRMA in San Antonio. I am nearing nearly 3 weeks after surgery and down to one drain. I just checked back into work today and may resume working from home next week...this has been quite a journey. I am tired of sleeping in a recliner...
Posts.Title: Any August 2012 girls? shabby6485 Beckers

Posts.Content: Aug 22, 2012 10:30AM Kd6blk wrote: I agree with seeing a good breast surgeon but I also want to say it was my lumpectomy that found my cancer. The biospsy was benign...so was the breast MRI, then surprise surprise...I am so glad I caught my cancer early. I just feel that biopsies are not conclusive and maybe that is why so many ladies are getting diagnosed only when the cancer is much further along...
